page.title: 04RISELEY VILLAGE POLICEMAN(l)
page.content: P.C.Lloyd works eight hours per day. Evenings are the busiest because that is when the accidents happen as the people come and go from work. He is a community policeman who deals with theft, damage, burglaries, traffic offences and accidents. P.C.Lloyd covers the area of Swineshead, Melchbourne, Knotting, Upper Dean, Lower Dean, Thurleigh and Riseley. He visits the schools because he likes to keep in touch with the children. He talks to them about such things as road safety. His station is Greyfriars in Bedford. He rides around on a motorbike or a push-bike. You are not allowed to have another job if you are a Policeman. He likes his job because he can talk to people.
